author: freeone3000
body: For Ubuntu 18.04 LTS, the powershell deb dependency should be on libicu57 instead of libicu55 as it was on Xenial.

comments.author: iSazonov
freeone3000
comments.body:
Proper package was powershell-preview, the powershell package was for
xenial, not bionic. Thanks for looking into this.

comments.body: Sounds like your question was answered.  Please reopen if that is not correct.

title: Ubuntu 18.04 Bionic - move libicu55 to libicu57
